column1: Section 67(1) of the Partition Law reads as follows:

Subject 
to 
the  provisions  of  sections  36A  and  45A,  an

appeal  shall 
lie 
to 
the  Court  of  Appeal  against  any
judgment, decree or order made or entered by any court in

any  partition  action;  and  all 
the  provisions  of 
the  Civil
Procedure  Code  shall,  subject  to  the  succeeding  provisions
of  this  section,  apply  accordingly  to  any  such  appeal  as
